content: Republic of the Philippines EULOGIO “AMANG” RODRIGUEZ INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY Nagtahan, Sampaloc Manila OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT March 18, 2025 MEMORANDUM NO. 024-2025 TO: ALL EARISTIANS FROM: THE PRESIDENT SUBJECT: INSTITUTE CALENDAR FOR ACADEMIC YEAR 2025 2026 1.0 In consonance with CHED guidelines, the Institute Calendar for Academic Year 2025-2026 is as follows: 1.1 First Semester, SY 2025-2026 Entrance Examination Schedule for freshmen and transferees ● First Batch: ○ April 27, 2025 ○ May 4, 2025 ○ May 18, 2025 ○ May 25, 2025 ● Second Batch: ○ June 8, 2025 ○ June 15, 2025 ○ June 22, 2025 ○ May 26, 2025 ● Third Batch: July 13, 2025 ● Fourth Batch: TBA 1.2 Enrolment Schedule: May 5 August 23, 2025 ● Fourth and Fifth Year ● Third Year ● Second Year ● First Year ● Graduate Program ● Adjustment Period (ADC): August 26 – 30, 2025 1.3 Start of Classes: August 26, 2025 1.4 Midterm Examination: October 20 – 26, 2025 1.5 Christmas Break: December 15, 2025 – January 4, 2026 1.6 Classes Resume: January 5, 2026 1.7 Final Examination: January 12 – 18, 2026 1.8 Classes End: January 18, 2026 1.9 Deadline for Encoding of Grades: January 24, 2026 2.0 Second Semester, SY 2025-2026 2.1 Enrolment Schedule: January 26 – February 7, 2026 ● Fourth and Fifth Year ● Third Year ● Second Year ● First Year ● Graduate Program ● Adjustment Period (ADC): February 9 – 14, 2026 2.2 Start of Classes: February 9, 2026 2.3 Midterm Examination: April 6 12, 2026 2.4 Final Examination ● 2.4.1 Graduating: June 1 7, 2026 ● 2.4.2 Non – graduating: June 8 14, 2026 2.5 Deadline for Encoding ● 2.5.1 Graduating: June 20, 2026 ● 2.5.2 Non – graduating: June 27, 2026 3.0 Intersession / Summer 2026 3.1 Enrolment Schedule (All levels): June 22 – 27, 2026 3.2 Adjustment Period: July 6 – 9, 2026 3.3 Intersession / Summer Classes: July 6, 2026 – August 15, 2026 4.0 Commemorative Activities 4.1 Amang’s Death Anniversary: December 9, 2026 4.2 EARIST 81st Foundation Day & Amang’s 142th Birthday: TBA 5.0 Classes may be suspended by the President in case of inclement weather, calamities and/or disasters. 6.0 Please be guided accordingly. (Signed) ROGELIO T. MAMARADLO, ECE, Ed. D.
